pricing.title: Makeup Service Packages

trial.name: Makeup Trial

engagement.name: Engagement Look

reception.name: Reception Glam
reception.includes: Premium HD Makeup, Advanced Hair Styling, Contouring & Highlighting, Premium Lashes, Draping Assistance, Touch-up Kit

bridal.name: Bridal Package
bridal.includes: Luxury HD Bridal Makeup, Bridal Hair Styling, Full Face Contouring, Premium Lash Extensions, Saree Draping, Accessory Setting, Touch-up Kit, 2 Hours On-Call Support

fullWedding.name: Full Wedding Package
fullWedding.includes: 4 Different Looks, Full-Day Coverage, Premium Products, Complete Styling, Draping for All Events, Personal Touch-up Kit, Priority Booking Support

additionalServices.heading: Additional Services
